title: Broken website link
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tribunal/

I verified my email then it had a link that sent me to this website then I got an error.


Error: 404
“Looks like you’re lost. Need a map?”
This page is missing or has been moved.

Fix the website please? You shouldn't be linking to 404 error pages lol.

replies.body:
Why would it link you to the tribunal? Like what?

Are you sure you didn't get stooged? Change your e-mail.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=7jpWql2A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-13T07:35:13.627+0000)
>
> Why would it link you to the tribunal? Like what?
> 
> Are you sure you didn't get stooged? Change your e-mail.

no idea why lol they just did. in game link when I logged in offered a 4 game IP boost for verifying my email and after that was done a link to that page was on the last page.
I know of the IP boost for verifying your e-mail, but I don't recall it sending you to the non-existent tribunal. Could you screen-cap it?
